description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. AstroPuzz combines retro asteroid game action with puzzle game strategy. Fire colored warp probes at asteroids to collect them. Be careful! Only like colored warp probes can be used together to collect asteroids. Differing colored warp probes destabilize and fly off!
description.short: AstroPuzz combines retro asteroid game action with puzzle game strategy. Fire colored warp probes at asteroids to collect them. Be careful! Only like colored warp probes can be used together to collect asteroids. Differing colored warp probes destabilize and fly off!
